scripts.debug-no-webpack: node ./dev/toggleGlobals.js true && node ./dev/compileTemplates.js debug && npm run start-static
scripts.debug: node ./dev/toggleGlobals.js true && node ./dev/compileTemplates.js debug && npx webpack --mode development && npm run start-static
scripts.debug-sw: node ./dev/toggleGlobals.js true sw && node ./dev/compileTemplates.js debug && npx webpack --mode development && node ./dev/createCachedList && npm run start-static
scripts.build: npx eslint . && node ./dev/toggleGlobals.js false && node ./dev/compileTemplates.js && npx webpack && node ./dev/createCachedList
scripts.prod:
npm run build && sudo systemctl stop nginx && echo 'server stopped' && sudo cp -r dist/* /var/www/sabernews/html/ && echo 'copied' && sudo systemctl start nginx && echo 'server started
Have fun'
scripts.deploy:
node ./dev/toggleGlobals.js true sw && node ./dev/compileTemplates.js debug && npx webpack --mode development && node ./dev/createCachedList && sudo systemctl stop nginx && echo 'server stopped' && sudo cp -r dist/* /var/www/sabernews/html/ && echo 'copied' && sudo systemctl start nginx && echo 'server started
Have fun'
